DOC.brief_summary: To investigate effect pulse width treatment response keloidal hypertrophic sternotomy scar 595-nm pulsed dye laser
DOC.brief_title: Effect Pulse Width Scar Treatment Using 595-nm Pulsed Dye Laser
DOC.detailed_description: The pulse width previous model pulse dye laser fixed 0.45 millisecond , whereas pulse widths late model PDL tunable range 0.45-40 millisecond . The long-pulsed PDL proven safe effective treat certain vascular abnormality include adult port-wine-stain small leg vein.9-12 In present study , would like investigate effect pulse width treatment response keloidal hypertrophic sternotomy scar 595-nm PDL .
DOC.criteria: Healthy , adult subject age 18 . Subjects must good health determine investigator . Presence keloidal hypertrophic sternotomy scar least 6 month Subjects must prior treatment scar within 1 month first treatment session . Subject authorized representative must sign Informed Consent Form prior study enrollment . Female subject know pregnant . Subjects scleroderma , connective tissue disorder , hematologic disorder , hepatitis , infection , uncontrolled diabetes mellitus . Subjects photosensitive dermatosis Systemic Lupus Erythematosus ( SLE ) Subjects documented positive HIV test . Subjects types anticoagulant . Subjects habitual smoker cigar , pipe tobacco , cigarette . Subjects history radiation treatment treatment site . Subjects use type treatment scar treatment site within one month first treatment visit . Subjects medication may interfere wound heal hemostasis . Subjects sign Informed Consent Form .
